topic.title: Cardiac Arrest Event Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.14"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Arrest Existence (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.27)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Arrest Existence (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.27)
